title: Jill Biden Underwent Medical Procedure on Left Foot
sub_head: An object became lodged in the first lady’s foot as she walked on a beach in Hawaii
body:
WASHINGTON—First Lady Jill Biden underwent a medical procedure Thursday to remove an object that got lodged in her left foot as she walked on a beach in Hawaii last weekend, her spokesman Michael LaRosa said in a statement.
President Biden joined Dr. Biden at Walter Reed National Military Medical Center for the procedure, Mr. LaRosa said.
After the procedure, Mr. LaRosa said in a statement that debris from an “unclear object” was removed from the puncture wound on Dr. Biden’s foot. The wound is free of infection and “is anticipated that it will heal nicely,’’ he said. The president and Dr. Biden returned to the White House after the procedure.
Dr. Biden visited Hawaii on her way back from Tokyo, where she led the U.S. delegation to the Olympic Games. She attended a Covid-19 vaccination clinic at a high school and a barbecue at Joint Base Pearl Harbor-Hickam for service members and their families.
Mr. LaRosa said that Dr. Biden stepped on the object before her appearances at the two public events.
